# Pulsar Sink third-party software

Pulsar Sink enables you to transfer events/messages from Pulsar topics to resources such as database tables. 

With DataStax Apache Pulsar Connector, you can transfer events/messages from Pulsar topics to Apache CassandraÂ®, DataStax Astra or DataStax Enterprise (DSE) tables.

Third-party software:
